contentrichtext.text: {{For|OLOS (obstructed-line-of-sight)|Non-line-of-sight propagation}} {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> Name = Olos | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Absoluuttinen Nollapiste]] | Cover =| Released = March 3, 2000 | Recorded = December 15 - December 17, 1999 and January 3 - January 21, 2000 | Genre = [[Progressive rock]] | Length = 45:36 | Label = [[Johanna Kustannus]], [[Love Kustannus]] | Producer = [[Otto Hallamaa]] and [[Absoluuttinen Nollapiste]] | Last album = ''[[Suljettu]]''<br />(1999) | This album = ''Olos'' <br /> (2000) | Next album = ''[[Olen pahoillani - valitut teokset 1994-2000]]''<br />(2001) | }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|3|5}} [{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r579475|pure_url=yes}} link] | rev2 = ''[[Rumba Magazine|Rumba]]'' | rev2Score = 4.5/5 (May 2000) | rev3 = ''[[Soundi]]'' | rev3Score = 4/5 [http://www.soundi.fi/arkisto/cds_0400_03.html April, 2000] | noprose = yes }} '''''Olos''''' (2000) is an [[album]] by the [[Finland|Finnish]] rock group [[Absoluuttinen Nollapiste]]. ==Track listing== # "Valajas helkures" (Aake Otsala, Aki Lääkkölä) – 3:02 # "Kalkin sammutus" (Otsala, Tommi Liimatta) – 4:10 # "Kotiinpaluu, jotenkin" (Otsala, Liimatta, Lääkkölä) – 3:02 # "Tavan sinä pyhität" (Liimatta, Otsala, Tomi Krutsin) – 3:41 # "Ja jos" (Liimatta) – 3:54 # "Tie tomun suuntima" (Liimatta, Lääkkölä) – 4:06 # "Neljä ruukkua neliössä" (Liimatta, Lääkkölä) – 3:47 # "Synkkää lunastusta, baby" (Liimatta, Lääkkölä) – 3:33 # "Käsitys mummoloista" (Otsala, Liimatta, Lääkkölä) – 5:15 # "Soita kotiin, Elvis" (Liimatta) – 3:33 # "Harhailua maastossa" (Liimatta, Lääkkölä) – 4:44 # "Tonttirajat sovitaan humalassa" (Liimatta, Lääkkölä, Otsala) – 3:43 ==Personnel== * [[Tommi Liimatta]] - Vocals, Pieksämäki Guitar * Aki Lääkkölä - Guitar, Keyboards * Aake Otsala - Bass Guitar * Tomi Krutsin - Drums * Teemu Eskelinen - Vocals * Otto Hallamaa - Öylätti Guitar, Producer, Engineer, Mixing * [[Absoluuttinen Nollapiste]] - Producers * Juuso Nordlund - Engineer, Mixing * Pauli Saastamoinen - Mastering * Tuula Alajoki - Photography * Jooga Jykylä - Photography * Japa Mattila - Layout ==External links== * {{fi icon}} [http://absoluuttinennollapiste.fi/levyt/olos.html Album entry at band's official website] [[Category:Absoluuttinen Nollapiste albums]] [[Category:2000 albums]]
